byline.original: By MATTHEW GOLDSTEIN, ALEXANDRA STEVENSON and LESLIE PICKER

lead_paragraph: It was the latest sale by the activist investor William A. Ackman, whose fund, Pershing Square Holdings, is down 19 percent for the year.

headline.print_headline: Ackman, Having a Rough Year, Sells $1.5 Billion Stake in Canadian Pacific
headline.main: Ackman’s Hedge Fund Sells Off Big Stake in Canadian Pacific

snippet: It was the latest sale by the activist investor William A. Ackman, whose fund, Pershing Square Holdings, is down 19 percent for the year....
abstract: Investor William A Ackman's Pershing Square Capital Management sells its entire stake of 9.8 million shares in Canadian Pacific Railway, worth $1.5 billion.
